content: Steven Vaught is a recent MSc Physics graduate with a passion for software developement. His voyage into programming started with scripting simple data-oriented tasks related to Polymer Physics, and has exploded into a an intense excitement for all things computing related. He spends most of his time reading about or using new technologies in personal projects.
summary: Steven Vaught is a recent MSc Physics graduate with a passion for software developement. His voyage into programming started with scripting simple data-oriented tasks related to Polymer Physics, and has exploded into a an intense excitement for all things computing related.
title: Steven Vaught

title: WetLabApp

title: Infection Simulation
